summary: The document is a Warrant Indenture dated November 17, 2025, between NexMetals Mining Corp. and Computershare Trust Company of Canada, outlining the terms for issuing warrants that allow holders to purchase common shares of NexMetals. The indenture details the creation, issue, exercise, and adjustment of warrants, as well as the rights and obligations of the corporation and the warrant agent. It also includes provisions for meetings of warrantholders, supplemental indentures, and general terms governing the agreement.
